titlestmt.titleproper: University at Albany Publication; Records ua392

publicationstmt.publisher: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-29 00:38:11 -0400.

repository.corpname: M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives

did.abstract: This collection consists of materials used in the drafting and publication of the UAlbany Magazine.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the materials retained by the Office of University Relations for the creation and publication of the UAlbany Magazine. It includes photographic prints, mounted prints with cutting and editing instructions, printing orders, article drafts, story proposals, and mockups sheets.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: All material for this collection were transferred to the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections & Archives from the communications offices in the Management Services Building (MSC) on Western Avenue, circa 2015.
